Topic
:     Modification in wooden pattern using combination aluminium and acrylic parts.
Description              :     Use of aluminium and acrylic parts in wooden pattern for complex and delicate
parts of component which are break down during ejection of mold and pattern. Development of guide

striking section, So that workers strike the hammer on the striking pad instead of directly on the pattern.
